gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 110, Pistons 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Trail Blazers defeated the Pistons, 110-101. Shaedon Sharpe recorded 29 points, seven rebounds, and five assists for the Trail Blazers, with Jerami Grant adding 24 points and one rebound in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 30 points, five rebounds, and four assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Trail Blazers improve to 2-3 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-3.
